title: RETURN: Switch Book 3
description: Can one impulsive act set you on a course that changes your life forever? Nova's decision has impacted everyone she loves. But what if she could go back and start over as if it never happened? Would that really fix things? Reality is a moving target, forever changing. Nothing is ever really the same.Now Nova must become the powerful traveler everyone believes her to be. But there's only one person who can show her how to do that, and she's been dead for decades...
author: M.H. Rice
